entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low.
